description: Celeriac mash makes traditional shepherd's pie lighter and even more delicious.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Celeriac Mash Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan over a medium heat, drizzle the oil and cook the onion and carrots for 3-4 minutes until soft.
Increase the heat to high and add the lamb mince, cook for 4-5 minutes until browned. Add tomato puree and Worcestershire sauce and cook for 2 more minutes.
Pour over the beef stock, bring to a simmer, place a lid on top and cook for 20 minutes. Remove the lid, stir and cook for another 20 minutes.

Heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Place the celeriac in a large saucepan, cover with water, bring tot he boil and cook for 10-15 minutes until tender. Drain, add the milk and butter and mash well.
Place the mince into an oven proof dish and spoon the celeriac mash on top in a smooth even layer. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and bubbling.
